Summer at Journey Messages Give LiveStream Leadership Team New Here Find Us Plan a Visit Leadership Team Journey Church Staff Team Scott Edinger Lead Pastor scott@journeysherwood.org Olivia Pothoff Pastor of Worship & Care olivia@journeysherwood.org Gabe Nielsen Director of Journey Youth gabe@journeysherwood.org Olivia Cuddeford Director of Journey Kids oliviac@journeysherwood.org Journey Church Leadership Board The Leadership Board at Journey Church is made up of six members of the Journey Church family and the Lead Pastor. They are assigned to help guide, equip, and empower the pastors and staff at Journey Church to fulfill the mission and vision that God has uniquely given us. Our current Leadership Board members: Megan O’Connell, Jon Burgi, Lacey McNay, Ed Hatch, Amy Schlapper, Josh Thoreson. If you have any questions for the Leadership Board please email: leadershipboard@journeysherwood.org Back to Top Events Messages FOLLOWING JESUS TOGETHER Phone 503.610.0759 Email info@journeysherwood.org Gather 22689 SW Pine Street, Sherwood, OR Mail PO Box 322, Sherwood, OR 97140 Subscribe To Our Weekly Update Sign up with your email address to receive our weekly email updates. Qualifies for 2025 Euro Baseball One month away from 2023 Euro Championship 2023 European Baseball Championship 2022 Prague Baseball Week Former player Chris Demetral named new Manager Upcoming Event 2025 European Championship Final Position:Â - Current Record: - 20/9/2025 10:30am Milan, IT Lithuania - : - Greece 21/9/2025 10:30am Milan, IT Greece - : - Switzerland 22/9/2025 3:30pm Milan, IT Greece - : - Italy Federation Message "After a long period of inactivity, the Hellenic Baseball Softball Federation is reactivating with the two sports now unified. The aim of the Federation is to create the new generation of sportsmen and women, to spread sports and to find new sports venues. In this new effort with completely different conditions from those of the past, everyone has a place. The strength of the Federation is the knowledge, experience and disposition of all the sportsmen and women who have climbed the home." - Kostis Liarommatis HBSF President Sponsorship The Greek National Baseball team is continuously looking for sponsorships and donations to help fund annual team expenses that include operations, travel, accomodations, camps, workouts, etc. We are extremely appreciative of all support. The National team is a 501c3 non-profit as well as a member of the Hellenic Baseball Softball Federation. If you are interested in supporting, you will be able to receive a tax deductible write off as part of our non-profit status. Please contact her at StKConnect@stkchurch.com regarding the listserv (email list) and/or the website. Presvytera utilizes many of the Archdiocese Department of Internet Ministries ' free services. She used one of their website templates and customized it for Saint Katherine. The website is hosted on the Archdiocese web server. Presvytera Pauline also uses a listserv which allows her to create, and continually maintain, our church's email list on the Internet. Click on this link to subscribe to our listserv. We are extremely grateful to the Archdiocese for offering these free services to our parish and hope that you find the website and listserv to be informative and useful.
